remarks: Lemma for ~ pythagtrip .  Show that ` C ` and ` B ` are relatively prime under some conditions.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-Apr-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: pythagtriplem3 $p |- ( ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN /\ C e. NN ) /\ ( ( A ^ 2 ) + ( B ^ 2 ) ) = ( C ^ 2 ) /\ ( ( A gcd B ) = 1 /\ -. 2 || A ) ) -> ( B gcd C ) = 1 ) $.
